author: Leon Edwards
description: A great looking tasty dessert cocktail. Whiskey, coffee and chocolate sipped through a layer of minty cream.
name: Midnight Over Tennessee
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Dark crème de cacao liqueur
15 ml Green crème de menthe green

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE first three ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
Separately SHAKE cream and crème de menthe and carefully strain over drink to layer
